text:
For young people like yourself probably best to move around different companies. As I did at the beginning. I have worked for many companies. MPC, framestore, mill, bbc, aardman, glassworks etc. 
Now have been at Dneg the longest. My present project is Dr Who. Previously worked on Netflix dark crystals, Altered Carbon. X-men , Godzilla, Narnia. And soon going to another big film project in a week’s time. We are working on films like fast and furious atm. 
I also do other things outside work. 
You can check me on Instagram: Laraib.atta 
I haven’t really posted since August haha been busy. Hope I have answered all your questions. If you have more feel free to ask them here.
